name: Unique Word Finder
tagline: C++ code that takes text and finds instances of unique words vs all words and other statistics about text. Short project I made for fun and to demonstrate my coding style
body:
### Welcome to my Project
This page is dedicated solely to the 200-odd line project that I made for fun. Check it over, look at the code, like or despise my styling...yeah, there is really not that much to it.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
